<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Wild Fire Settings</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/api/v32.07/settings/wildfire"}></MethodEndpoint>



```
x-prisma-cloud-target-env: {"permission":"monitorCI"}
```



Returns the wildfire settings.

<div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

WildFireSettings are the settings for WildFire API requests

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"apiKey"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"APIKey is the key identifier used for WF APIs.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"apiKeyExpiration"} required={false} schemaName={"date-time"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"APIKeyExpiration is the expiration time of the API key.\n","format":"date-time","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"lastError"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"LastError is the last error that occurred when trying to create/update the wildfire key.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>policy</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

WildFirePolicy is the global wildfire usage policy, set by the client

</div><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"agentlessEnabled"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"AgentlessEnabled indicates whether agentless scan will consult WF.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"complianceEnabled"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"ComplianceEnabled indicates whether compliance malware scan will consult WF.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"graywareAsMalware"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"GraywareAsMalware indicates whether files with WF verdict of Grayware will be treated as malware.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"region"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Region is the WF server region to query.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"runtimeEnabled"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"RuntimeEnabled indicates whether runtime malware scan will consult WF.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"uploadEnabled"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"UploadEnabled indicates whether files will be uploaded to WF.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples
